item.title: Keeper
item.description: Starting with a nmap scan we have this result When we access the IP address on port 80 via a browser, we can see there is just one link which redirects to tickets.keeper.htb/rt. But in order to do that we need to add this IP to our /etc/hosts file 10.129.122.221 tickets.keeper.htb 10.129.122.221 keeper.htb i’ve ried some default passweords and dource code but it wasn’t helpful i’ve googled and searched in exploit db but found no exploit mentioned in the web page so i searched for default creds for Request tracker
